name: B!lliards
description:
2015-11-18: Fixed some bugs, added a shot indicator, added standard Billiards and Pool games, various other little things.

A procedurally-generated billiard-table game, created for ProcJam 2015.

Alas, I ran out of time so very few of the games it generates are actually worth playing, but it does produce some cool ideas at times!
